Description.Text: Ukraine Hotel Simferopol is an elegant 3-star hotel offering modern accommodation in the heart of Simferopol. Highlights include onsite dining, a bar, beauty salon and an excellent location close to the Crimean Ethnographic Museum. Simferopol City Centre is largely business orientated and an important hub for political and economic activity in the south of Ukraine. Nearby places of interest include Vorontsov Palace, the Crimean Ethnographic Museum and the Scythian Naples ruins. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Simferopol destinations. The hotel is housed in an impressive mid-rise building with an elegant yellow facade featuring decorative stonework and wrought iron balconies. Facilities include a wellness centre with a sauna, steam room and beauty salon. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with carpeted floors, striped wallpaper and light wood furniture. Amenities include cable/satellite TV and a fridge. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower or bathtub with integrated shower. Ukraine restaurant offers European cuisine in a grand setting with an elegant green, blue and gold colour scheme, floor-to-ceiling windows and elaborate curtains. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the stylish Lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
